opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: United States v. Union Central Life Insurance Company

opinion:
365 U.S. 858

81 S.Ct. 826

5 L.Ed.2d 822

UNITED STATES, petitioner,
v.
UNION CENTRAL LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY.

No. 722.

Supreme Court of the United States

March 27, 1961

Solicitor General Cox, Assistant Attorney General Oberdorfer, and I. Henry Kutz and Fred E. Youngman, for the United States.

H. William Butler, for respondent.

1

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Michigan granted and case transferred to the summary calendar.
